participant_1.background:
I drive a mini van.
Coffee is my preferred beverage.
I also like a glass of wine in the evenings.
I coach little league baseball.

participant_2.background:
I spend my time bird watching with my cats.
I am an animal activist.
The holidays make me depressed.
My age is too old to say.

content.text: I'm a little bit of a coffee snob. I love all types of coffee, but I especially love a good cup of espresso.
I'm not really a coffee drinker. I prefer tea.
I love tea too! I especially love peppermint tea.
I'm more of an herbal tea person. I love chamomile tea.
Chamomile tea is great for calming down. I drink it when I'm stressed.
I drink it when I'm feeling sick. It helps me to relax.
I also like to drink wine in the evenings. I'm not much of a drinker, but I love a good glass of wine with dinner.
I don't drink alcohol. I'm an animal activist, and I don't want to support the alcohol industry.
I understand. I respect that.
Thanks.
I'm also a volunteer coach for my son's little league team. I love working with kids and helping them to learn the game of baseball.
That's great! I'm sure your son is lucky to have you as a coach.
Thanks. I try my best.
I'm sure you do.
So, what do you do for fun?
I spend a lot of time bird watching with my cats. I'm an animal activist, and I love to see all the different types of birds that come to my yard.
That's awesome! I love animals too. I have two dogs and a cat of my own.
That's great! I love dogs. They're such loyal animals.
They are. I'm so glad I have them in my life.
I'm sure they're glad to have you too.
